name: Beaten
description:
You are an AI-droid appeared in a strange place crowded with other droids. This place has its own laws which you need to abide unless you want to be disassembled. Challenge your way through so you can finally get yourself together.

CONTROLS:

Movement - [WASD] or [ARROWS]
Jump - [Space]
Flashlight - [F]
Interaction - [E]
